Class Notebook

  • java.lang.Object
    • Notebook

  • public class Notebook
extends java.lang.Object
    Since:
    0.1.1

    • Method Summary

      Allows to add a new note to the Notebook.

    • Method Detail

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Returns:
        a size of the ArrayList notes

      • addNote

        public boolean addNote()
        Allows to add a new note to the Notebook.
        Returns:
        true - if the note was successfully added, otherwise false.

      • removeNote

        public boolean removeNote(int i)
        Allows to remove the note from Notebook. Gives an opportunity to the user to choose to remove the note by typing "yes" in a console.
        Parameters:
        i - - the index of the note which should be removed.
        Returns:
        true - if the note was successfully removed, otherwise false.

      • editNote

        public boolean editNote(int i)
        Allows to edit the note from Notebook by rewriting something new instead. Gives an opportunity to the user to choose to edit the note by typing "yes" in a console.
        Parameters:
        i - - the index of the not which should be edited.
        Returns:
        true - if the note was successfully edited, otherwise false.

      • showAllNotes

        public void showAllNotes()
        Allows to see notes from notebook all at once
